name: StrapON! OS
short_description:
StrapON! OS is a Linux live distribution that can be used to do customized installations of multiple Linux distributions. The system includes GUI tools that use chroot and several bootstap programs to do the distro installation.

StrapON! OS' GUI tools can also be used to fix an allready installed system when it fails to boot. These features can be very handy for Linux users that don't have many command-line skills.
summary: Advanced system recovery Live system and multi-distro installer
